items.typeLine: Physician's Divine Life Flask of Bounty
explicitMods: 19% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
Recover an additional 28% of Flask's Life Recovery Amount over 10 seconds if used while not on Full Life
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Call of the Void
explicitMods: All Damage with Hits can Chill
All Damage Taken from Hits can Chill you
Enemies Chilled by your Hits can be Shattered as though Frozen
Enemies Chilled by your Hits lessen their Damage dealt by half of Chill Effect
flavourText: Only when the mind is empty of ambition
can the cold truth of existence take hold.
